Original meaning 本义: Meaning drum.

English senses 英语理解: drum; beat, top, strike

Usage example 用法举例: 鼓動 gǔ dòng (agitate)

Importance by frequency 常用频率: 1059

Shuowen 说文解字: 郭也春分之音萬物郭皮甲而出故為之鼓從壴支象其手擊之也周禮六鼓靁鼓八面靈鼓六面路鼓四面鼖鼓皋鼓晉鼓皆兩面凡鼓之屬皆從鼓徐鎧曰郭者覆冒之意

鼔字的康熙字典解释

【亥集下】【鼓字部】　鼔； 康熙笔画：13； 页码：页1526第03
【唐韻】公戸切，音古。【說文】从攴从壴，壴亦聲。【廣雅】鼓鳴也。【廣韻】擊鼓也。【左傳·莊十年】長勺之戰，公將鼔之。又凡有所擊搏曰鼔。【易·離卦】不鼔缶而歌。【詩·小雅】鼔瑟吹笙，吹笙鼔簧。【又】鼔鍾于宮。　又鐘所擊處，亦謂之鼔。【周禮·冬官考工記】鳧氏爲鐘，于上謂之鼔，鼔上謂之鉦。　又【正韻】撫也，歙也。　又振動也。【易·繫辭】鼓天下之動者存乎辭。【又】鼔之舞之以盡神。　又扇也，扇火動橐謂之鼔。【前漢·終軍傳】膠東魯國鼔鑄鹽鐵。【註】如淳曰：扇熾火謂之鼔。○按《說文》鼔舞之鼔从攴，攴音朴。鐘鼓之鼓从支，微有不同。今槩用支，不復用攴矣。

考證：〔【易·繫辭】鼓天下之物者存乎辭。〕　謹照原文鼓天下之物改鼓天下之動。

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Hai Ji 2] [Drum Character Department] 　鼔; Kangxi Strokes: 13; Page Number: Page 1526 No. 03
[Tang Yun] Gongfu cut, sound ancient. [Speaking text] From the 攴 to the 壴, the 壴 also sounds. [Guang Ya] Drumming too. [Guang Yun] Drumming also. [Zuo Zhuan · Ten Years of Zhuang] The battle of Long Shao, the general 鼔zhi. And wherever he fights, he said 鼔. 【Yi·Li Gua】Sing without singing. 【Poetry·Xiaoya】Blowing the Sheng, playing the Sheng reed. [Also] The bell is in the palace.　The place where the bell strikes is also called 鼔. [Zhou Li·Dongguan Kao Gong Ji] Fu is a bell, which is called 鼔 on top, and 鼔 on 鼔 called 钲.　[Zheng Yun] Fu Ye, She Ye.　Vibrate again. 【Easy·Cici】The mover of the world is always in Ci. [Also] The dance of 鼔 is so fascinating.　Fan again, fan fire is called 鼔. [Previous Han · Final Army Biography] Jiaodong Lu Guotai cast salt iron. [Note] Ru Chun said: Fan Chihuo is called 鼔. ○According to "Shuowen", the 鼔 dance of 鼔 Cong 攴, the sound of Pu. The bells and drums are slightly different from each other. Today, use support, not reuse stubbornness. Textual research: [[Yi·Xi Ci] The one who drums up the world is Cun Hu Ci. 〕 　 I would like to change the world’s movement according to the original text.
